  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3736</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3736</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La flexibilitat, amplitud de moviment</string>
            <string language="en">Flexibility, ease of movement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flexibilität, Mühelosigkeit der Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Flexibilité, facilité du mouvement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Flexibilidade, facilidade do movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flessibilità, facilità di movimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευελιξία, ευκολία της μετακίνησης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la flexibilitat (qualitat física). Es divideix en tres subapartats: definició i tipus de flexibilitat, el cos humà i la flexibilitat i com entrenar la flexibilitat de forma saludable. S'hi introdueixen conceptes com ara estirament, estiraments passius i actius.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on physical flexibility, in three sections: definition and types of flexibility, the human body and flexibility, and a healthy way to achieve flexibility. It includes aspects such as stretching, both passive and active.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">estratègia d'aprenentatge</string>
            <string language="en">learning strategy</string>
            <string language="es">estrategia de aprendizaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació física</string>
            <string language="en">physical education</string>
            <string language="es">educación física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">esport</string>
            <string language="en">sport</string>
            <string language="es">deporte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">entrenament esportiu</string>
            <string language="en">sport training</string>
            <string language="es">entrenamiento deportivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material didàctic</string>
            <string language="en">teaching materials</string>
            <string language="es">material didáctico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf körperlicher Flexibilität, in drei Kapiteln: 
Definition und Typen der Flexibilität, des menschlichen 
Körpers und der Flexibilität und der gesunden Methode, Flexibilität
zu erzielen. Sie schließt Aspekte wie Ausdehnen ein, passiv und
aktiv.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
la flexibilité physique, dans trois sections : définition et 
types de flexibilité, le corps humain et la flexibilité, et une voie
saine de réaliser la flexibilité. Elle inclut des aspects tels
que l'étirage, passif et actif.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) na 
flexibilidade física, em três seções: definição e tipos de
flexibilidade, o corpo humano e a flexibilidade, e uma maneira 
saudável conseguir a flexibilidade. Inclui aspectos tais como 
esticar,  passivo e ativo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su 
flessibilità fisica, in tre sezioni: definizione e tipi di 
flessibilità, il corpo umano e la flessibilità e un modo sano 
realizzare flessibilità. Include le funzioni come allungamento,
sia passivo che attivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη φυσική 
ευελιξία, σε τρία τμήματα: καθορισμός και τύποι ευελιξίας,
του ανθρώπινου σώματος και των ευελιξιών, και υγιών τρόπων να 
επιτευχθεί η ευελιξία. Περιλαμβάνει τις πτυχές όπως το 
τέντωμα, και ενεργητικό και ενεργό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernenstrategie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sporttraining</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
